name: Ethan (Demo)
description:
Ethan (Demo)

Ethan is a Hades Clone game that was created as a Demo project for the Unity Course at Mentorama.

The project was used to teach the concepts behind game development and also how to create complex player mechanics, combat system, menu system, loading system, cutscene system and more.

__________________________________

How to Play

AWSD / Arrows - Movement

LMB - Normal Attack / Combo Attack

LMB (Hold 1s) - Charged Attack

RMB - Ranged Attack (to the Mouse Direction)

Space - Dash (to Player Facing Direction)

Obs.: Please play on fullscreen mode or the Windows Standalone version for a better experience.

__________________________________

More Information:

Not all assets were created by me, here are a few exceptions:

- Sword model, Flail and Cannon enemies were obtained through Unity Asset Store.

- Animations were obtained from Mixamo and also from Unity Asset Store.

- Some Particle textures were obtained from Kenney.

- Music and Sound Effects were obtained from some Royalty Free sites.

__________________________________

Trivia:

- Ethan is the same character from one of my previosu game, "Star Saver", that is why on the Title Screen he says "I am the Star Savior, Ethan".

- Ethan is the older brother from the "Star Hope" game's main character, Ruthar.
